UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The vertebrate peptide antibiotics dermaseptins have overlapping structural features but target specific microorganisms.
Literature.Author: Mor A, Hani K, Nicolas P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas caviae IP67-16T(MIC=6µM),Escherichia coli IP76-24(MIC=6µM),Enterococcus faecalis IP103214(MIC=6µM),Staphylococcus aureus IP76-25(MIC=>150µM),Nocardia brasiliensis IP16-80(MIC=>150µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae IP118079(MIC=20µM),Candida albicans IP884-65(MIC=40µM),Cryptococcus neoformans IP960-67(MIC=6µM),Trichophyton simii IP1063-74(MIC=70µM),Aspergillus niger IP218-53(MIC=90µM),Aspergillus fumigatus IP1025-70(MIC=90µM)
